using namespace std;

#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>

#define wl while
#define fl(i,a,b) for(i=a; i<b; i++)

int arr[100005];

int main()
{
	int n, q, qn, m, i;
	char str[10];
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &q);
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%s%d", str, &qn);
		//cout<<"qn="<<qn<<"\n";
		if(str[0]=='U')
		{
			scanf("%d", &m);
			for(i=1; qn*i<=n; i++)
			{
				arr[qn*i]+=m;
				//cout<<" "<<qn*i<<" ";
			}
		}
	
		else
		{
			printf("%d\n", arr[qn]);
		}
			/*cout<<"\narr";
		fl(i,1,n+1)
			cout<<arr[i];
		cout<<"\n";*/
	}
	return 0;
}
